title: BREAKING: Supreme Court says Centre’s latest affidavit defending the abrogation of Article 370 will NOT be considered by the Supreme Court during the hearing. Centre’s latest affidavit has no bearing on the constitutional question before the Court, says CJI DY Chandrachud.
